item.title: Reflections after reading "What I Talk About When I Talk About Running" 1: The Rhythm of Life
item.description: I stumbled upon Haruki Murakami’s “What I Talk About When I Talk About Running” again, where he uses running to discuss life. As he says, writing about running honestly is, in a way, writing about myself honestly. Murakami seeks to use running as a medium to organize his thoughts on spending roughly a quarter-century as both a novelist and an ordinary person. The Purpose of Life: Writing Murakami’s life goal is writing, and supported by running.
